p: The pathological findings were as follows: in the hyperplastic fibrous tissue, there were hyperplastic lymphoid tissues, lymphoid follicles, a large number of eosinophils between follicles and small hyperplastic blood vessels in the follicles, which focally infiltrated striated muscle ( Figure 2). Immunohistochemistry findings were as follows: CD3(+), CD20(+), CD21(FDC+), CK(–), and Cyclin D1(–).
